name: Alpine Avalanche Action
description:
A small VR game made for the Hüttenjam 2023 on the Turracherhöhe within 48 hours for the theme "Extreme Conditions".

All alone atop the beautiful Turracherhöhe mountain you set yourself up for a relaxed day of skiing, but... out of nowhere a massive avalanche comes crashing down, threatening to bury you alive! 

Try to escape it with all your skills, pick up boosts and use ramps to jump over obstacles.

In a race against time you have to stay ahead of the threat, risking everything to survive! Will you emerge victorious or will you fall prey to the unforgiving force of nature?

Get ready for the ride of your life in this epic VR game, where extreme conditions are just the beginning!

How to Play
  • Use the stick on your left VR controller to start the ride.
  • Tilt the controllers to the side to steer left and right.
  • Tilt forward and squat down to gain speed.
  • Raise your hands to look cool while jumping.
